The most competitive and fair game i have ever played (not counting cheaters). I think people get distracted every once in a while, try new things, search for a random cs:go like game, go with the bandwagon, but they all come back after a while. This game was not made by the valve, it was made by the community, Valve adopted it later and they've been taking good care of it since. And it's not just about the regular matchmaking, just look at the various community game mods like surfing, zombie plague, jailbreak,etc. (although they're seen less with cs:go they're still there); don't forget the officially supported game modes like flying scoutsman, arms race (watered down gungame), danger zone, etc. ; goddamn operations and much much more. This game has not been around for 20 years for nothing, Every game wants to be like counter strike, but nobody has became one, or even came close (yet).
This game is like a bastard child of valve that was praised so much by the people that they had to adopt it, made probably the best decision, and it soon became valve's favourite, so much so that they forgot the one that probably made cs possible (yeah, i am still waiting for you to count to 3 valve)
Best fps in my opinion.
